bug.summary: Incorrect maintaining of states for words?
bug.description:
One of our colleagues got in touch with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/willfrey>@willfrey</denchmark-link> and he mentioned an issue with the pytorch-ctc implementation: <denchmark-code>He pointed out that the scorer in pytorch-ctc wasn't maintaining state between words properly, rendering it a "spell checker" (only scoring unigrams basically) </denchmark-code>
I'll do some investigation into this claim and report back!

comments.comment: This is definitively true. Fix incoming.
